MMR in EmONC facilities declined by 24% 
in Uganda (from 829 to 634 maternal deaths 
per 100,000) and by 28% in Zambia (from 
629 to 453 maternal deaths per 100,000).
Decrease in Perinatal Deaths in Facilities: 
The perinatal mortality rate (PMR) is defined 
in this report as the number of stillbirths and 
predischarge neonatal deaths divided by the 
total number of births in the same facilities. 
It is an overall measure of the quality of 
antenatal and obstetric care. In Uganda, the
